
copy-snapshot
*************


DESCRIPTION
===========


SYNOPSIS
========

   aws ec2 copy-snapshot
     --source-snapshot-id <value>
     --source-region <value>
     [--description <value>]


REQUIRED PARAMETERS
===================

"--source-snapshot-id"  (string)

"--source-region"  (string)


OPTIONAL PARAMETERS
===================

"--description"  (string)
